author: CBC News
title: Ontario confirms 375 new COVID-19 cases, as long-term care homes grapple with more deaths
description: Ontario has 11 more deaths, according to CBC tallies. Meanwhile, Toronto and Mississauga are enforcing physical distancing measures this weekend, while more non-essential businesses and some construction sites will be shutting down Saturday night.
content:
LATEST COVID-19 UPDATES IN ONTARIO:
  • Ontario residents receive emergency alert Saturday to stay home to slow COVID-19 spread
  • St Clair O'Connor retirement home in Toronto reports four patient deaths 
  • Pinecrest Nursing Home reporting two… [+10914 chars]
